long_description: The REI Outrigger Bucket hat offers protection from the sun and other outdoor weather while you're climbing switchbacks on the trail and paddling across the lake. Cotton/nylon blend offers the cool, breathable comfort of cotton and the durability of nylon. Polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Soft, breathable cotton lining feels great against your head. Low-profile brim provides ample sun protection; snaps up on sides for versatility. The REI Outrigger Bucket hat has an adjustable chin strap that secures the hat in windy weather.
short_description: The REI Outrigger Bucket hat offers protection from the sun and other outdoor weather while you're climbing switchbacks on the trail and paddling across the lake.
